title: since Android 11 update, the Wi-Fi is constantly falling.
content: Helo, after update to android 11 it is not possible to connect to the internet via wifi  Keeps falling down. I tried to : Reset router at home, trying other wifis (restaurant etc.), reseting connectivity in my phone, restarting phone - nothing helped so far. May I ask you for a solution or an instruction hoe to downgrade back to A10?
